North_Little_Rock.Marshall Square Historic District: The Marshall Square Historic District encompasses a collection of sixteen nearly identical houses in Little Rock, Arkansas. The houses are set on 17th (south side) and 18th (north side) Streets between McAlmont and Vance Streets, and were built in 1917-18 as rental properties Josephus C. Marshall. All are single-story wood frame structures, with hip roofs and projecting front gables, and are built to essentially identical floor plans.
